lbl_refedeclaration1: I declare under oath that I have included in this contract personally subscriber information based on the documentation I received it. I acknowledge and understand that any misrepresentation of the data included in this contract or documentation received, causes damage to Nextel Communications of Mexico , SA de C.V. , my constituents and the subscribe.
lbl_refedeclaration2: I will check my bill in the Nextel Web site (www.nextel.com.mx) under the terms and conditions established for these purposes,regardless of the paper invoice
lbl_refedeclaration3: The email is considered for all legal means a media written notifications and hereby shall be deemed received and shall take effect immediately after receiving the email in full validity

lbl_consenttosend: Consent to Send Personal Information Advertisers
lbl_consentdescription: Through this clause , Subscriber or not to grant your consent to the commission agent for all personal information compiled on the basis of the provisions of the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Individuals, is transferred or transmitted to third parties for purposes Marketers and advertising , and to send advertisements about goods , products and services related to the provision of services under this contract
lbl_subscribercontent: By checking here the customer agrees to all terms and conditions relating to this contract.

lbl_errormessage: Sorry! You must enter the required information before you can continue.
lbl_yourorderfailed: Sorry! Your order can not be placed for now. Inconvenience regretted. Please try again.
lbl_faq1q: How do I start a new session of the VDSC application?
lbl_faq1a: You must use your Nextel, IUSACELL or AT&T network ID and password.
lbl_faq2q: If I have a problem with the application, how do I contact the support group?
lbl_faq2a: Please access the FAQ link to find the answers to most of your questions. If you cannot find the answer here, contact the support group by email.
lbl_faq3q: How do I know what Sales Channel to select?
lbl_faq4q: How do I make changes to the order?
lbl_faq4a: Before you click on the “Submit” button, you can click the “Back” button and make your changes.
lbl_faq5q: If the customer wants to change their order after I have submitted it, how do I make changes?
lbl_faq6q: How do I close a session?
